thread.title: Carol Hooley
thread.title_full: Barking Mad Dog Care reviewed by Carol Hooley

author: Carol Hooley
title: Carol Hooley
text: This was the second time Ollie had been to stay with Jan and Phil and I already knew he was going to love every minute.. which of course he did . I couldn't ask for better care thank you both so much and yes , he did cry after you so that says it all really . One very happy little dog and one extremely content owner . Until the next time .. lots of love Ollie and his Mum .
